title: Seeing by numbers
creator_credit: Janice Kay, Bob Thorpe and London Television Service
brief_description: Presents the history of information from the 13th century and the new ways we can communicate. Shows everyday applications of numerical analysis in such areas as weather forecasting, telephone information systems, education and business.
